# YELLING

A comprehensive toolkit for expressing yourself textually.

## Installation

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("hadley/YELLING")
```

## Usage

``` r
library(YELLING)
```

### Volume Control

``` r
YELL("hello")
#> [1] "HELLO"

WHISPER("PLEASE BE QUIET")
#> [1] "please be quiet"

SCREAM("fire")
#> [1] "FIRE!!!"

YELL_LOUDER("HELLO!")
#> [1] "HELLO!!!!"
```

### Emotional Expression

``` r
SARCASTICALLY("oh wow thats great")
#> [1] "Oh wOw tHaTs gReAt"

PASSIVE_AGGRESSIVELY("fine whatever sure")
#> [1] "fine. whatever. sure"

DRAMATICALLY("I cant believe it")
#> [1] "I... cant... believe... it"
```

### Internet Culture

``` r
CLAP("say it louder")
#> [1] "say ðŸ‘ it ðŸ‘ louder"

MOCK("I'm not mad")
#> [1] "i'm nOt mAd"
```

### Sound Effects

``` r
ECHO("hello")
#> [1] "HELLO... Hello... hello"

ELONGATE("no")
#> [1] "nooo"

STUTTER("what do you mean")
#> [1] "w-what d-do y-you m-mean"
```

### Utility

``` r
IS_YELLING("HELLO")
#> [1] TRUE

SHOUT_INTO_VOID("HELLO?")
#> [1] ""

INDOOR_VOICE("HELLO")
#> [1] "please use your indoor voice: hello"
```

### Scream Cipher

Based on [XKCD 3054](https://xkcd.com/3054/), encodes text using A with
different diacritical marks for each letter.

``` r
SCREAM_CIPHER("hello")
#> [1] "Ã…Ã‚ÇÇá¸€"

SCREAM_CIPHER("Ã…Ã‚ÇÇá¸€", decode = TRUE)
#> [1] "HELLO"
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`CLAP()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/CLAP.md) : Clap
  between words
- [`DRAMATICALLY()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/DRAMATICALLY.md)
  : Speak dramatically
- [`ECHO()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/ECHO.md) : Echo
  text
- [`ELONGATE()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/ELONGATE.md)
  : Elongate text
- [`INDOOR_VOICE()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/INDOOR_VOICE.md)
  : Use your indoor voice
- [`IS_YELLING()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/IS_YELLING.md)
  : Check if text is yelling
- [`MOCK()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/MOCK.md) : Mock
  text
- [`PASSIVE_AGGRESSIVELY()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/PASSIVE_AGGRESSIVELY.md)
  : Speak passive-aggressively
- [`SARCASTICALLY()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/SARCASTICALLY.md)
  : Speak sarcastically
- [`SCREAM()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/SCREAM.md) :
  Scream text
- [`SCREAM_CIPHER()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/SCREAM_CIPHER.md)
  : Scream cipher
- [`SHOUT_INTO_VOID()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/SHOUT_INTO_VOID.md)
  : Shout into the void
- [`STUTTER()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/STUTTER.md) :
  Stutter text
- [`WHISPER()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/WHISPER.md) :
  Whisper text
- [`YELL()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/YELL.md) : YELL
- [`YELL_LOUDER()`](https://hadley.github.io/YELLING/reference/YELL_LOUDER.md)
  : Yell louder
